description: {"blocks":[{"key":"f7euh","text":"This protocol details the co-expression and purification of Zika NS5 NS5 RNA-dependent RNA polymerase bearing a N-terminal His-SUMO tag at small scale (\u003c6L).\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"1dtsb","text":"Research was supported in part by NIAID of the U.S National Institutes of Health under award number U19AI171399. The content is solely the responsibility of the authors and does not necessarily represent the official views of the National Institutes of Health.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8opik","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atc0k","text":"The pOPINS-ZVRdRP construct cannot be distributed due to intellectual property restrictions on the vector. We are currently working on re-cloning the sequence into an open access vector, to be available for Addgene orders later.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f6mjb","text":"ZVRdRp N-terminal 6His-SUMO tagged co-expression construct was inoculated from its SixPack glycerol stock.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46g40","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2n0lq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dpc5c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4c9u9","text":"The ZVRdRp construct encodes the NS5 RdRp with a N-terminal His-SUMO tag fusion on a kanamycin resistant plasmid backbone with a T7 promoter.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4g9gd","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5a394","text":"*see disclaimer section regarding pOPINS vector*","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1s9os","text":"When the OD600 reaches approximately 2.0, lower the temperature and shaker speed to   and incubate   . Harvest in late afternoon on the second day.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":11,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":99,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cbbms","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F885B44328BE11EFB73A0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"180","start":null,"temperature":"18","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F885B50728BE11EFB73A0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"180","start":null,"temperature":"18","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4nlp2","text":"Perform IMAC to extract target protein from the lysed cell mixture    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":70}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2v8j8","text":"Wash the column with   of base buffer, followed by   of wash buffer twice. Allow wash buffer to pass through completely between washes. This is to remove non-specific and  weak binding contaminant proteins from the resin for a cleaner elution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b5c9k","text":"Collect all the washes separately for SDS-PAGE analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3254}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3254}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4k7dm","text":"Using the AKTA Pure system:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2g5ek","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qd2j","text":"Inject the sample onto a 5mL sample loop.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1o07a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85rml","text":"Run the sample down HiLoad 16/60 Superdex 200 pg gel filtration column at 1mL/min in gel filtration buffer, collecting 1mL fractions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bvv1p","text":"Aliquot into appropriate volumes for future usage to minimise freeze/thaw cycles. Flash-freeze in liquid nitrogen, and store at   until required.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":128,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3plv3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tteu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

Discard supernatant and store pellet by freezing at   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":94,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"firsl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"4000","duration":1800,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7v6oh","text":"Lyse by sonication     for a total 'on' time of   at 40% amplitude to fully rupture the cells. Ensure pellet is    during sonication to prevent overheating of the sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":112,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":4,"guid":"25FD190EA01911EE951C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"On","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":12,"guid":"25FD1958A01911EE951C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"Off","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"25FD1993A01911EE951C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":420,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A5FA6828FD9511EE90640A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"","unit":10}}}}

Incubate the resin with the supernatant for   while rotating or otherwise mixing gently at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":138,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":185,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"BA255EAFFD9611EE90640A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BA255F3EFD9611EE90640A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"19dgg","text":"Load the resin/supernatant mix back onto the gravity flow column, retaining the FT separately for SDS-PAGE analysis. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hujs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ie90","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fqk2i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7eqo1","text":"For SDS-PAGE samples, mix 15uL sample with 5uL 4x sample buffer, supplemented with 10mM DTT.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ccm4","text":"Elute the protein with   of elution buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","concentration":"0.5","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"CDE35FD0A01A11EE951C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3254}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"67kh0","text":"Repeat step 8.5 one more time, collecting a total of 2 separate elution fractions. This is to ensure maximum retrieval of protein from the resin, as well as removing remaining contaminants for later reverse IMAC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4nl3e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8k34v","text":"Measure the absorbance (A280) of the elution fractions using using Nanodrop and estimate the total protein concentration. Although still a mixture of proteins, A280 value can give an estimate of the protein content which will help to determine the amount of protease required to remove the affinity tag.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e6h0o","text":"Scrape off some of the glycerol stock with a sterile loop and use this to inoculate a 50 mL falcon tube containing   of LB supplemented with   carbenicillin. Grow the starter culture at       with 200 rpm shaking. {"blocks":[{"key":"6q61f","text":"Run SDS-PAGE for all samples from total lysis supernatant to final elution. Stain gel with protein staining solution Coomasssie Blue and determine the fractions that contain the protein of interest, by finding the band corresponding to the expected protein molecular weight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4ck0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bi14l","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9r9at","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5898l","text":"The target protein is expected to be present mostly in the elution samples, although small amounts may be found in the FT and washes. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dlr71","text":"If that is not the case, then further troubleshooting is required.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ap0a8","text":"Dispense   Nickel affinity resin Ni Sepharose 6 FF (Cytiva) into a empty gravity flow column. {"blocks":[{"key":"abls","text":"Pool and dilute the two elutions with base buffer to 50mL (1:4) , lowering the total imidazole concentration to 60mM.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69tnu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9mte0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fkd3u","text":"High concentration of imidazole will inhibit protease activity during tag cleavage. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fnneq","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dt7ef","text":"Alternatively, dialysis or desalting using pre-packed columns are also acceptable methods of lowering sample imidazole concentration.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2og1","text":"For tag removal, add His-SENP1 in 1:300 ratio to the total protein content of the diluted sample, as determined by nanodrop. Keep the mixture in the cold room at     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":162,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":164,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"14kbd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7CADD574F04211EEA0C70A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"7CADD4CAF04211EEA0C70A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2aaai","text":"Next day, pass the cleavage mixture over the washed resin (mentioned in step 8.7) three times and collect the final FT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2671h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dpgga","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fskh7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dqtk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ivgl","text":"This step will remove the cleaved tag and any uncleaved target from the sample. If the protease used is His-tagged, then the protease is also removed from this sample. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cu9ee","text":"Take samples of the FT and characterise content by SDS-PAGE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dthu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1a2dr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9C6EFA3728C211EFB73A0A58A9FEAC02","height":542,"id":490301,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"e625f\",\"text\":\"SDS-PAGE analysis of IMAC and cleavage fractions. {"blocks":[{"key":"d74pa","text":"Using 30,000 MWCO spin concentrators, concentrate the fractions, from the rIMAC step,  that contain target protein to a maximum final volume of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":144,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"evaa0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bmkar","text":"Remove any solid aggregates from the sample by centrifugation at   , then immediately draw up the supernatant with a 5mL syringe and a blunt-tip fill needle, taking care not to disturb the pellet. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5nc9i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tt58","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dckqv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6e7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"17200","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4ugoa","text":"This is to remove as much solid particles from the injection sample as possible, so as to not clog the in-line filter or frit of the column.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a2pkv","text":"From the chromatogram, analyse fractions F9-H8  by SDS-PAGE.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fs973","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5opjv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eps1b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8t33b","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8rjkm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"047AEDD828C311EFB73A0A58A9FEAC02","height":277,"id":490303,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"bubsk\",\"text\":\"Chromatogram of the ZVRdRp SEC run. Fractions F10-H4 were analyzed by SDS-PAGE to dentify the fractions that contained the target protein\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[{\"style\":\"bold\",\"offset\":0,\"length\":35}],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"new zika rdrp for prot.JPG","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qs8fb97zx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/q839b97zx.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/q838b97zx.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"20A1A2DE28C311EFB73A0A58A9FEAC02","height":327,"id":490305,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"6kff5\",\"text\":\"SDS-PAGE analysis of SEC fraction F10-H4. Fractions F12-G8 were pooled as they contain of target protein in comparison to contaminants. \",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[{\"style\":\"bold\",\"offset\":0,\"length\":41}],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"PAGE24-00544 - SEC result.PNG","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qs8ib97zx.png","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/q84bb97zx.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/q84ab97zx.webp","width":488}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dtki0","text":"Pool the fractions that contain the target protein, which in this case includes fractions from F12 to G8. Concentrate the sample in Vivaspin 500 30kDa MWCO centrifugal concentrator until the protein concentration reaches  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":220,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ak3o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crcib","text":"Take   of the final sample for SDS-PAGE.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3f0i7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aq1vq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mqs6","text":"Another    can be taken for mass spectroscopy (MS) analysis, which was not carried out here.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","concentration":"4.8","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"A23DD890FE5411EE93260A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","concentration":"1","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"A23DD83AFE5411EE93260A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"86BABAEA28C311EFB73A0A58A9FEAC02","height":791,"id":490307,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"2mh4l\",\"text\":\"SDS-PAGE of the final purified ZVRdRp construct. The higher molecular weight bands are likely polymeric forms of the target that failed to be monomerized during SDS-PAGE sample preparation. \",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[{\"style\":\"bold\",\"offset\":0,\"length\":49},{\"style\":\"bold\",\"offset\":93,\"length\":1}],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"PAGE24-00544 - Final  sample.PNG","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qs8kb97zx.png","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/q84db97zx.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/q84cb97zx.webp","width":478}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","concentration":"1","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"A23DD83AFE5411EE93260A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fdc5a","text":"Wash used IMAC resin with 10CV of base buffer, and leave in the column stored with a small amount of the same buffer such that the resin is kept moist.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1hnpu","text":"This washed IMAC resin will later be reused for reverse IMAC (rIMAC)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3picu","text":"(Optional) elute rIMAC resin with   elution buffer to confirm if the protein shows non-specific binding to the resin used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"40cbj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tpu9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3a92e","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"062E8DB6FE5211EE93260A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3254}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"r8or","text":"This will help determine if the protein is \"sticky\" to the Ni resin matrix material, and help in further troubleshooting if the final yield is lower than expected. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
